thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Redwood Pharma Acquires Intellectual Property Rights

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Redwood Pharma Acquires Intellectual Property Rights

organizations.name: brief-redwood pharma acquires intellectual property rights march

text:
March 8 (Reuters) - Redwood Pharma Ab:
* REDWOOD PHARMA ACQUIRES INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY RIGHTS * HAS ENTERED INTO AN AGREEMENT REGARDING ACQUISITION OF CERTAIN PATENT AND PATENT APPLICATIONS
* PAYMENT WILL OCCUR THROUGH ISSUANCE OF 525,000 SHARES BY REDWOOD PHARMA.
* REDWOOD ACQUIRES PATENT AND PATENT APPLICATIONS, AS WELL AS DATA, FOR A CONSIDERATION OF SEK 5.1 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
